name: Netflix
overview:
Netflix is the world's leading Internet television network with more than 33 million members in 40 countries enjoying more than one billion hours of TV shows and movies per month, including Netflix original series.
For one low monthly price, Netflix members can watch as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, on nearly any Internet-connected screen.
Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments.  Learn more about how Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) is pioneering Internet television at www.netflix.com or follow Netflix on Facebook and Twitter.
